# Mufeed VH

> Mufeed VH is the CEO and Co-founder of Winfunc (YC S24), a company building AI-powered security audit tools. He is the creator of Devika, an open-source AI Software Engineer, and a security researcher who has found 300+ CVEs in open-source software. He represented India at the WorldSkills Olympiad in Cyber Security and has secured companies like Google, Mastercard, Okta, and DELL through bug bounty programs.

This website contains Mufeed's projects, blog posts on AI and security, open-source contributions, and professional background. Most projects focus on AI agents, LLM tooling, security tools, and systems programming in Rust and Python.

## About

- [About Mufeed](https://mufeedvh.com/about/): Biography, achievements, press mentions, and social profiles
- [Projects](https://mufeedvh.com/projects/): Complete list of open-source projects with CVE work and security hall of fames

## Blog

- [Security in the age of LLMs](https://mufeedvh.com/posts/llm-security/): Analysis of security threat models in the age of AI, covering prompt injections, sandboxing extended LLMs, SSRF vulnerabilities in AI agents, and AI alignment considerations

## Key Projects

- [Devika](https://github.com/stitionai/devika): An Agentic AI Software Engineer that understands high-level instructions, breaks them into steps, researches information, and writes code. Open-source alternative to Devin by Cognition AI
- [Opcode (formerly Claudia)](https://github.com/winfunc/opcode): A powerful GUI app and toolkit for Claude Code. Create custom agents, manage interactive sessions, and run secure background agents
- [DeepClaude](https://github.com/winfunc/deepclaude): High-performance LLM inference API and Chat UI integrating DeepSeek R1's Chain-of-Thought reasoning with Anthropic Claude models
- [code2prompt](https://github.com/mufeedvh/code2prompt): CLI tool to convert codebases into a single LLM prompt with source tree, prompt templating, and token counting
- [blockoli](https://github.com/winfunc/blockoli): High-performance code indexing, embedding generation, and semantic search tool for use with LLMs
- [stackwalk](https://github.com/winfunc/stackwalk): Universal language-agnostic AST walking and accurate call stack generation with tree-sitter
- [titor](https://github.com/winfunc/titor): High-performance checkpointing library enabling time-travel capabilities through directory snapshots with incremental backups and cryptographic verification
- [binserve](https://github.com/mufeedvh/binserve): Fast static web server with routing, templating, and security in a single binary with zero code setup
- [moonwalk](https://github.com/mufeedvh/moonwalk): Cover tracks during Linux exploitation by leaving zero traces on system logs and filesystem timestamps
- [basecrack](https://github.com/mufeedvh/basecrack): Tool to decode all alphanumeric base encoding schemes
- [pdfrip](https://github.com/mufeedvh/pdfrip): Multi-threaded PDF password cracking utility with common password format builders and dictionary attacks
- [regretti](https://github.com/mufeedvh/regretti): Programming language where comments are first-class citizens and ASCII art flowcharts are controls. Won voter's choice at Lang Jam
